Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I was born on May 31, 1987 in Voronezh. I studied at the Koltsov's Gymnasium. At school I got carried away with Olympiad programming. Then I graduated from the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics of Voronezh State University as a specialty system programmer. I have been working as a software engineer since 2009 as a fullstack developer(backend + frontend). I write in programming languages:

  • C++
  • Python
  • Go
  • Rust

And I use technology:

  • Django
  • Flask
  • FastAPI
  • WASM
  • MongoDB
  • Docker
  • K8s
  • Kafka
  • Prometheus
  • MySQL
  • PostgreSQL

Contacts:

  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • Mail
